name: Match-3-Line-Drawer Prototype
description:
Welcome!

Here is a prototype of a match 3 line game I made. Similar to games like Best Fiends or Caveman Story.

You can buy and download the source code I created in C# to use with unity, to help give you a starting point in these match 3 line type games. 

Controls

Press and hold Mouse 1 (Left Click) move cursor over tiles to be selected.

Press Mouse 2 (Right Click) to deselect all the tiles that have been selected.
